title: [A prayer for assistance against the Armada]
author: H. R. (Henry Roberts), fl. 1585-1616.
publisher: By Edward Allde for Hency [sic] Car,
notes: Signed Rob. H. at foot of page. Title from STC. Publication date question by STC.
